item.description:
Max has graciously invited us back to celebrate the solstice at his family's home - Winslow Farm - in West Falmouth. As many of you know this is an extremely beautiful spot very close to Portland.

This is an informal, social-only event with no specific agenda other than sharing a potluck meal to start.

Here are directions from Max:
From Portland follow Rt 100 North (Washington Ave) until it turns into Gray rd in Falmouth. We live 2 miles north of Hannaford on the right. The farm is called Winslow Farm, there is a farm stand building, and a greenhouse with a flower business there. We live in the large barn in the back. The address is 291 Gray Rd.

Don't forget to bring your potluck kit (dish/bowl/utensils/cup/napkin)!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Solstice Potluck & Bonfire at Winslow Farm
